Item.label: Part Reuse
Item.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:msxsl="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt" xmlns:exslt="http://exslt.org/common" extension-element-prefixes="exslt" xmlns:aras="http://www.aras-corp.com"> <xsl:output method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="yes"/> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:variable name="repeated_items"> <xsl:for-each select="//Item[@type='Part']"> <xsl:variable name="cur_id" select="@id"/> <xsl:variable name="count" select="count(//Item[@type='Part' and @id=$cur_id])"/> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="($count > 1) and (not(count(preceding::Item[@type='Part' and @id=$cur_id])))"> <count>1</count> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:variable> <Result> <xsl:variable name="result"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="function-available('exslt:node-set')"> <xsl:value-of select="sum(exslt:node-set($repeated_items)/count)" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="function-available('msxsl:node-set')"> <xsl:value-of select="sum(msxsl:node-set($repeated_items)/count)" /> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number($result) or number($result+1)"> <xsl:value-of select="$result"/> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </Result> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
Item.name: Part Reuse

Item.label: Current
Item.query: <Item type="Part BOM" action="get" select="related_id(id)" page="1" pagesize="100000"> <related_id> <Item type="Part" action="get" select="id"> <is_current>1</is_current> </Item> </related_id> </Item>
